attributes.action: amend the law granting citizenship to spouses of British citizens after 3 or mor years of marriage without the need to reside in the UK during this period.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a British citizen married to an Egyptian. My wife and I have been married  for 6 years. We have twins who have obtained the British citizenship as well. I understand the nationlization law dictates that a spouse has to reside for 3 years with his/her British dependant in the UK. I am petitioning an amendment whereby the spouse is granted citizenship after being married for 3 years or more regardless of the location. Many of us work abroad and cannot be expected to change where and how we live for our families to gain citizenship.
